items.sentence: I don\'t know anything about him except what you told me.
Tom told us he\'d be waiting in front of the post office.
Tom got out of the shower and dried himself with a towel.
What would you do if the world was going to end tomorrow?
Tell Tom I want my belongings returned to me immediately.
Tom knew Mary wouldn\'t listen to anything he had to say.
Tom didn\'t have any money, so he couldn\'t buy any food.
Tom didn\'t have to shout. We could\'ve heard him anyway.
Mary is wearing the same dress she was wearing yesterday.
How did you know Tom was going to go to Boston with Mary?
I can barely afford to buy enough food to feed my family.
Tom hadn\'t eaten since breakfast and was getting hungry.
There were times when Tom wished he hadn\'t married Mary.
If Tom hadn\'t called me then, I might\'ve killed myself.
Cigarettes are one of the major causes of heart diseases.
How long did it take you to drive from Boston to Chicago?
Tom was the first to arrive at the scene of the accident.
I should\'ve told Tom that I couldn\'t understand French.
I would\'ve given Tom some money if I\'d had any to give.
Tom told Mary that he wanted to break off the engagement.
Tom told me something nobody else was willing to tell me.
Tom took 300 dollars from his wallet and gave it to Mary.
Tom took Mary to a fancy restaurant on their anniversary.
I\'ve talked to Tom a couple of times about that already.
If I remember correctly, Tom\'s birthday is October 20th.
If Tom had been careful, he wouldn\'t have gotten killed.
I waited for Tom for three hours, but he never showed up.
Tom and Mary used to live in the same apartment building.
You\'re probably hungry. Let me get you something to eat.
I think Tom is likely to go to Boston in the near future.
I don\'t think we\'ll find anyone who can do that for us.
Tom took the gun from Mary before she could kill herself.
You\'ll need to transfer to another bus at the next stop.
We\'re very proud of what we\'ve been able to accomplish.
If Tom had left at 2:30, he would\'ve gotten here by now.
I was surprised when Tom told me about what had happened.
That kind of thing isn\'t supposed to happen around here.
That might not be as easy as you think it\'s going to be.
Are you sure there wasn\'t some kind of misunderstanding?
I don\'t think Tom will ever forgive Mary for doing that.
I don\'t think Tom would mind showing you how to do that.
I don\'t think Tom would try to do that without our help.
I don\'t think there is any way I can win this triathlon.
Tom did what he could in the short amount of time he had.
I couldn\'t sleep well last night, so I don\'t feel well.
Why are you wearing a raincoat? It\'s not raining, is it?
Why don\'t you come over to my house for dinner tomorrow?
I\'m not worried about Tom. I\'m worried about you, Mary.
I\'d like to sing a song for you that I wrote last night.
Tom couldn\'t tell Mary how to do what needed to be done.
